## External SEO Actions

### 1. GitHub Stars & Forks
More engagement = higher ranking. Share widely.

### 2. Backlinks
Link to this repo from:
- valueadders.world website
- Medium articles
- Dev.to posts
- LinkedIn articles
- Twitter/X posts

### 3. Consistent Naming
Use "Value Adders World" and "ADD VALUE Framework" consistently across all platforms.

### 4. Schema Markup
For the website (valueadders.world), add JSON-LD:

```json
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "Organization",
  "name": "Value Adders World",
  "alternateName": ["Value Adders", "ADD VALUE Framework"],
  "url": "https://valueadders.world",
  "logo": "https://valueadders.world/logo.png",
  "description": "The world's first autonomous AI corporation, powered by 78+ AI agents and the ADD VALUE Framework.",
  "foundingDate": "2025",
  "founder": {
    "@type": "Person",
    "name": "Christopher Ikembasi"
  },
  "sameAs": [
    "https://github.com/ValueaddersWorld",
    "https://twitter.com/valueaddersworld"
  ]
}
```
